content.question: A stick is used to hit a ball at an angle above the horizontal, as shown in Figure 1. Figure 2 shows the free body diagram of the ball. Figure 3 shows the free body diagram of the stick. Which of the following pairs of forces represents an action-reaction pair and the object or objects involved in the action-reaction pair?

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
